title: 362: The Bible Broads are BACK w/ Taylor Tomlinson
itunes:title: 362: The Bible Broads are BACK w/ Taylor Tomlinson
description:
Today The Broads are joined by the incredible stand up comedian Taylor Tomlinson! They chat the TikTok star generation, how Taylor started in stand up comedy, discovering they were all raised in evangelical Christian homes, fear of hell people vs excitement for heaven people, being scared to masturbate, dealing with jealousy, therapy, fear, psychedelics, giving birth, and a whole lot more! Make sure to check out Taylor’s new special “Look at You” on Netflix coming March 8th! 

 

TAYLOR TOMLINSON: 

Follow Taylor on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/taylortomlinson/

See Taylor on tour here: https://ttomcomedy.com/shows 

Watch Taylor’s comedy special “Quarter Life Crisis” on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/title/81157965 

Check out Taylor’s podcast “Sad in the City” here: https://www.youtube.com/c/SadintheCityPodcast

Taylor’s website: https://ttomcomedy.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THREDUP: Go to THREDUP.COM for an extra 50% off plus FREE SHIPPING on your first order!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts! 

***JENNI KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM to get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout!

***BALLSY: Go to BALLWASH.COM/CHATTYBROADS20 and use code CHATTYBROADS20 to receive 20% off!

***DIPSEA: Get an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
